publ: by Brian Tang and Chester Leung
name: ChowTime
0:
”Alexa, ask ChowTime to check what time McDonald's closes in New York City”
”Is Chipotle open right now in San Francisco?”
”Alexa, open ChowTime”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chowtime
des: ChowTime is your solution for finding out a restaurant's hours of operation or simply seeing if the restaurant is open at the current time. Just make sure you provide the name of the establishment and the city it is located in when using ChowTime. For example, you can say "Alexa, ask ChowTime if Olive Garden is open today in Milpitas" or "Alexa, ask ChowTime when Boiling Crab opens in Las Vegas." Depending on which phrasing you used, Alexa would then provide you with whether or not the restaurant is open or give you the restaurant's operating hours.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
